get.description: Fetches a list of all users who have the 'tourist' role. Requires 'admin' role.

post.summary: Create a new tourist account (Admin only)
post.description: Creates a new user, assigns the 'tourist' role, and requires 'admin' role for access.

requestBody.description: Data for the new tourist account

put.description: Updates an existing tourist's details. Requires 'admin' role.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the tourist to update

400.description: Bad Request: User is not a tourist

delete.description: Deletes an existing tourist account by ID. Requires 'admin' role.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the tourist to delete

400.description: Bad Request: User is not a tourist

post.summary: Log a user into the application
post.description: Authenticates a user with email and password and returns a Sanctum API token.

200.description: Login successful, returns the user and the API token.

role.description: The primary role of the user.

message.example: These credentials do not match our records.

post.description: Revokes the current API token, effectively logging the user out.
Creates a new user account using name, email, and a confirmed password.

user.description: Details of the newly created user.

errors.description: Details of validation errors, e.g., {'email': ['The email has already been taken.']}

get.description: Retrieves a list of all submitted applications. Requires 'admin' role.

post.description: Allows any user to submit an application to become a navigator.

motivation.example: I want to share my knowledge of the city.

patch.description: Changes the status of a specific application (pending, approved, or rejected). Requires 'admin' role.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the application to update

delete.description: Deletes a specific navigator application. Requires 'admin' role.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the application to delete

get.description: Retrieves a list of all existing navigator profiles, including associated user data. Requires 'admin' role.

post.summary: Create a new navigator user and profile (Admin only)
post.description: Creates a User account with the 'navigator' role and an associated NavigatorProfile. Requires 'admin' role.

requestBody.description: Data for the new navigator account and profile

201.description: Navigator account and profile created successfully

message.example: Navigator account and profile created successfully.

put.summary: Admin update for any navigator profile
put.description: Allows an administrator to update any navigator's user and profile details, including the 'verified' status.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the navigator profile to update

message.example: Navigator profile updated successfully by admin.

put.description: Allows a navigator to update their profile details (user data and profile data). Requires 'navigator' role and ownership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the navigator profile to update (must match the authenticated user's profile)

403.description: Unauthorized: not the profile owner or role mismatch

delete.description: Deletes a specific navigator profile. Requires 'admin' role.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the navigator profile to delete

get.description: Retrieves the profile and user data associated with the authenticated navigator.

data.description: The navigator profile object with nested user details.

put.description: Allows an authenticated user to change their password by providing the current password and a new confirmed password.

message.example: The provided current password does not match your actual password.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all service requests where the authenticated user is the assigned navigator. Requires 'navigator' role.

403.description: Unauthorized: navigator access required or not authenticated

patch.description: Allows the navigator to update the status of an assigned request to Pending, Confirmed, or HandOff. Requires 'navigator' role and ownership of the request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the request to update

delete.description: Deletes an assigned service request. Requires 'navigator' role and ownership of the request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the request to delete

get.description: Retrieves a list of all reviews submitted in the system, with tourist and navigator details. Requires 'admin' role.

post.description: Allows an authenticated tourist to submit a review for a navigator. A tourist can only review a specific navigator once.

navigator_id.description: ID of the navigator being reviewed.

403.description: Unauthorized: Only tourists can create reviews.

409.description: Conflict: You have already reviewed this navigator.

get.summary: Get reviews submitted by the authenticated tourist (Tourist only)
get.description: Retrieves a list of all reviews written by the authenticated user. Requires 'tourist' role.

403.description: Unauthorized: Only tourists can view their reviews.

get.summary: Get reviews received by the authenticated navigator (Navigator only)
get.description: Retrieves a list of all reviews given to the authenticated navigator. Requires 'navigator' role.

403.description: Unauthorized: Only navigators can view their reviews.

delete.description: Allows the authenticated tourist to delete their own review. Requires ownership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the review to delete

403.description: Unauthorized: You can only delete your own review.

patch.description: Allows the authenticated tourist to update the rating and comment of their own review. Requires ownership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the review to update

comment.example: It was good, changed my rating to 4.

403.description: Unauthorized: You can only edit your own review.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of verified navigator profiles. Can be filtered by city and language.
Retrieves a list of all service requests created by the authenticated tourist. Requires 'tourist' role.

post.description: Allows an authenticated tourist to send a new service request to a specific navigator. Requires 'tourist' role.

date.description: Date and time of the request (must be in the future).

number_of_people.description: Number of people in the group (min 1).

message.example: We are looking for a 3-hour tour in the morning.

delete.description: Allows the authenticated tourist to delete/cancel one of their service requests. Requires ownership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the request to delete

patch.description: Allows the authenticated tourist to update an existing request, but only if its status is 'Pending'. Requires ownership.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the request to update

400.description: Bad Request: Cannot edit a non-Pending request.

put.description: Allows the authenticated tourist to update their name, email, and profile picture. Requires 'tourist' role.
